FILE: Alchemist Marie & Elie - Futari no Atelier (Japan) (Demo) (WonderWitch).zip
NAME: Alchemist Marie & Elie : Futari no Atelier
NAME_ZH: 炼金术士玛丽与艾莉：两人的工作室
DESC:
In the city of Salburg, there has always been a long tradition of alchemy - a magical science that dealt with combining various materials and turning metals into gold. You play as two young girls, Marlone and Elvira, who have to study at the Academy of alchemy, make powerful items, and prove to their masters they are worthy to be real alchemists.

The game is a combination of role-playing and simulation. You have to read books and talk to people in order to learn more about items, and then to buy these items or to to find them somewhere. You must combine powerful items in order to impress your teachers. You also develop your characters in a standard RPG fashion. You can equip weapons and armor on them, and fight random enemies in wilderness areas. You gain levels and become stronger the more enemies you fight. The battles are automatic, and you can only assign a general strategy to your characters.
DESC_ZH:
在萨尔堡市，炼金术一直有着悠久的传统——这是一门神奇的科学，涉及将各种材料混合并将金属转化为黄金。你将扮演两位年轻女孩，玛洛妮和埃尔薇拉，她们必须在炼金术学院学习，制作强大的物品，并向她们的导师证明自己有资格成为真正的炼金术士。

这款游戏结合了角色扮演和模拟元素。你必须阅读书籍并与他人交谈，以了解更多关于物品的信息，然后购买这些物品或在某处找到它们。你必须制作出强大的物品，才能给你的老师留下深刻印象。你还可以按照标准的角色扮演游戏方式培养你的角色。你可以为她们装备武器和盔甲，并在野外区域与随机出现的敌人战斗。你战斗的敌人越多，就能获得更多等级并变得更强。战斗是自动进行的，你只能为你的角色指定大致的策略。

NAME: Another Heaven : Memory of Those Days
NAME_ZH: 另一个天堂：那些日子的回忆
DESC: Another Heaven: Memory of Those Days is an Adventure game, developed and published by Omega Micott, which was released in Japan in 2000.
DESC_ZH: 《另一个天堂：那些日子的回忆》是一款冒险游戏，由Omega Micott开发并发行，于2000年在日本发售。

NAME: Arc the Lad : Kijin Fukkatsu
DESC:
Two generations ago, there was a great battle between the humans and the machines. Led by their evil god, the machines were eventually able to win the battle and to take control over the world. You play the role of Elc, the hero of  Arc the Lad 2. As always, Elc is a freelance mercenary who gets assignments from his guild. He encounters Finia, a girl who belonged to a resistance group and whose mother was killed by the machines. With the help of other friends, the heroes must save the humanity and restore the world to normal.

This is a side-story in Arc the Lad series, set in a futuristic environment. As in the classic Arc the Lad games, the entire dungeon navigation is perceived as a series of continuous battles. You move your heroes in turn-based mode, and enemies use their turn to perform their moves. You can attack once an enemy is on a square near you, and also use a variety of special techniques.
DESC_ZH:
两代人之前，人类与机械之间爆发了一场大战。在邪恶之神的带领下，机械最终赢得了这场战争，并掌控了世界。你将扮演《弧光之月2》的主角埃尔克。和往常一样，埃尔克是一名自由雇佣兵，从公会接受任务。他遇到了菲妮亚，一个隶属于抵抗组织的女孩，她的母亲被机械杀害。在其他朋友的帮助下，英雄们必须拯救人类，让世界恢复正常。

这是《弧光之月》系列的一部外传，故事背景设定在未来世界。和经典的《弧光之月》游戏一样，整个地下城探索过程被视为一系列连续的战斗。你以回合制模式操控英雄行动，敌人也会利用自己的回合进行行动。当敌人出现在你附近的方格时，你可以发起攻击，还能使用各种特殊技能。

NAME: Blue Wing Blitz
DESC: There are six nations living in the world of floating islands. The most powerful one is the Ordia Empire, possessing the best aircrafts in the world. But its leaders were hungry for even more power, and planned to invade and to occupy the other five nations. The other nations tried to maintain diplomatic relationship with the Empire as long as possible. But one of those countries, the Esk Republic, decided to send a special strike team of skillful pilots, attempting to initiate a secret rebellion against the Empire. A young pilot named Keid, guided by his senior partner, the girl Payer, is the one who was chosen for this mission.
DESC_ZH: 在浮空岛的世界里，生活着六个国家。其中最强大的是奥尔迪亚帝国，它拥有世界上最先进的飞行器。然而，帝国的领导者们贪得无厌，妄图进一步扩张势力，于是计划入侵并占领其他五个国家。其他国家都尽可能地与帝国维持着外交关系。但其中一个国家，埃斯克共和国，决定派遣一支由技艺精湛的飞行员组成的特别突击队，试图对帝国发动一场秘密反抗。一位名叫基德的年轻飞行员，在他的搭档、女孩佩尔的带领下，被选中执行这项任务。

NAME: Dark Eyes - Battle Gate
NAME_ZH: 暗黑之眼 - 战斗之门
DESC: Dark Eyes ~ Battle Gate tells the story of a battle between two races on a pioneer planet.  This Strategy RPG also supports the WonderGate, allowing additional features to be downloaded with a cellular phone
DESC_ZH: 《暗黑之眼 ~ 战斗之门》讲述了在一颗开拓星球上两个种族之间的战斗故事。这款策略角色扮演游戏还支持“奇迹之门”功能，允许玩家通过手机下载额外内容。

NAME: Dicing Knight.
DESC: Dicing Knight. follows the journey of a nameless knight fighting through a series of randomly generated dungeons. The game will start on the floor of a dungeon, your goal being to find the floors key to progress to the next floor. Eventually you will reach a dungeon boss, after you beat it you'll be allowed access to a new more difficult dungeon. Dungeons are timed by a “Food Gauge” which when depleted will force you to exit the dungeon.azq
DESC_ZH: 《掷骰骑士》讲述了一位无名骑士在一系列随机生成的地牢中战斗的旅程。游戏将从地牢的一层开始，你的目标是找到该层的钥匙，以便进入下一层。最终你会遇到一个地牢首领，击败它后，你将可以进入一个更具挑战性的新地牢。地牢设有“食物计量表”计时，当计量表耗尽时，你将被迫离开地牢。azq

FILE: Digimon - Anode Tamer & Cathode Tamer - Veedramon Version (Hong Kong) (En).zip
NAME: Digimon - Anode Tamer & Cathode Tamer
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝：阳极驯兽师与阴极驯兽师
DESC: This release contains the first  Digimon Adventure, both  Anode Tamer and  Cathode Tamer versions. The game is based on the manga and animé series Digimon. You play as an ordinary Japanese boy named Ryou who gets sucked into the mysterious digital world and has to help the digital monster Agumon and his friends to recruit digital monsters and send them into battles against evil ones.
DESC_ZH: 此版本包含第一部《数码宝贝大冒险》的阳极驯兽师版和阴极驯兽师版。该游戏基于漫画和动画系列《数码宝贝》改编。你将扮演一位名叫辽的普通日本男孩，他被卷入神秘的数码世界，必须帮助数码怪兽亚古兽及其朋友们招募数码怪兽，并让它们与邪恶的数码怪兽展开战斗。

NAME: Digimon Adventure 02: D1 Tamers
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝大冒险02：D1驯兽师
DESC:
This is a sequel to  Digimon Adventure 02: Tag Tamers, set in the world of digital monsters based on the popular manga series. After having defeated the evil Millenniumon, our hero Ryou thought that would be his last travel to the Digiworld. However, the four sacred Digimons summon him once again, to participate in the D1 monster fighting tournament. But that is not all: it appears that Millenniumon is still alive, and is looking for revenge! Now Ryou has to win the tournament and defeat his archenemy once again.

The gameplay is nearly identical to that of the previous game. You travel through top-down and isometric locations, fighting monsters with your own monster team, and then recruiting new monsters and assembling a collection. The battles are turn-based and are viewed from an isometric perspective. The monsters have various kinds of attacks in their disposal. Each attack is shown as a short animated sequence.
DESC_ZH:
这是《数码宝贝大冒险02：徽章驯兽师》的续作，游戏设定在基于热门漫画系列的数码怪兽世界中。在击败邪恶的千年兽后，我们的主角辽以为这将是他最后一次前往数码世界。然而，四大神圣数码兽再次召唤他，让他参加D1怪兽格斗锦标赛。但事情还不止如此：千年兽似乎还活着，并且正在寻求复仇！现在，辽必须赢得锦标赛，并再次击败他的死敌。

游戏玩法与前作几乎相同。你将在俯视视角和等轴测视角的场景中穿梭，带领自己的怪兽团队与其他怪兽战斗，然后招募新的怪兽并进行收集。战斗采用回合制，以等轴测视角呈现。怪兽可以使用各种攻击技能，每次攻击都会以一段简短的动画展示。

NAME: Digimon Tamers - Battle Spirit Ver.1.5
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝驯兽师 - 战斗精神1.5版
DESC: Digimon Tamers: Battle Spirit Ver. 1.5 is a fighting game developed and published by Bandai and released exclusively in Japan for the WonderSwan Color handheld console. It is an expansion to Digimon Tamers: Battle Spirit (released in the United States and Europe as Digimon Battle Spirit) and contains many new features and characters. Unlike its predecessor or sequel, Digimon Battle Spirit 2, this game did not receive a Game Boy Advance port.
DESC_ZH: 《数码宝贝驯兽师：战斗精神1.5版》是一款由万代开发并发行的格斗游戏，仅在日本的彩色万代掌机（WonderSwan Color）上发布。它是《数码宝贝驯兽师：战斗精神》（该游戏在美国和欧洲发行时名为《数码宝贝战斗精神》）的扩展版本，包含许多新功能和新角色。与它的前作或续作《数码宝贝战斗精神2》不同，这款游戏没有推出Game Boy Advance移植版。

NAME: Digimon Tamers - Battle Spirit
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝驯兽师：战斗精神
DESC:
Digimon Battle Spirit is a fighting game originally published by Bandai and developed by Dimps for the Japanese-only WonderSwan Color handheld system under the name Digimon Tamers: Battle Spirit. It was later ported to Nintendo's Game Boy Advance for international releases in North America and Europe two years later. 
 
The game features characters and Digimon that were included in the first three seasons of the animated series of the same name in a somewhat simplistic fighting scenario, and also has slightly arranged samples of the show's soundtrack.
DESC_ZH:
《数码宝贝战斗精神》是一款格斗游戏，最初由万代发行，Dimps开发，仅在日本的WonderSwan Color掌机系统上推出，名为《数码宝贝驯兽师：战斗精神》。两年后，该游戏被移植到任天堂的Game Boy Advance上，在北美和欧洲等地区发行。

游戏以同名动画系列前三季中出现的角色和数码宝贝为特色，战斗场景略显简单，同时还采用了该动画配乐的微调版本。

NAME: Digimon Tamers: Brave Tamer
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝驯兽师：勇敢驯兽师
DESC:
Based on the popular Digimon manga, this is a sequel to  Digimon Adventure 02: D1 Tamers. The game picks up directly where the previous one ended. After yet another ultimate battle against the evil Millenniumon, during which he revealed to the hero Ryou a terrifying secret, there was a great explosion. Ryou comes to his senses in an unknown place. The only digital monster there explains to him that the explosion send Millenniumon to the future, while Ryou ended up in the past. And now Millenniumon is trying to take control over the main computer in the Digiworld, and it is Ryou's task to stop him once and for all, and to finally find the truth about his and his archenemy's identities.

The gameplay is similar to that of the predecessors: you navigate your hero over the top-down view, descend into dungeons, fight monsters in turn-based combat, recruit them into your party, and send the new teams to fight new enemies. The battle are not isometric any more, but viewed entirely as animé-style pictures. Attacks are also depicted as animated sequences.
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏基于热门的《数码宝贝》漫画改编，是《数码宝贝大冒险02：D1驯兽师》的续作。游戏紧接着前作的结尾展开。在与邪恶的千年兽进行又一场终极对决时，千年兽向主角辽透露了一个可怕的秘密，随后发生了一场大爆炸。辽在一个陌生的地方苏醒过来。那里唯一的数码怪兽向他解释说，爆炸将千年兽送到了未来，而辽则来到了过去。现在，千年兽正试图控制数码世界的主计算机，辽的任务就是一劳永逸地阻止他，并最终揭开他和宿敌身份的真相。

游戏玩法与前作类似：你可以在俯瞰视角中操控主角，进入地下城，在回合制战斗中与怪物战斗，招募它们加入你的队伍，并派遣新的队伍去对抗新的敌人。战斗不再是等距视角，而是完全以动漫风格的画面呈现。攻击也以动画序列的形式展示。

NAME: Digimon Tamers: Digimon Medley
NAME_ZH: 数码宝贝驯兽师：数码宝贝大乱斗
DESC:
"Digimon Medley" is based on the popular manga and and animé series Digimon, in which ordinary Japanese children find a way into a digital world, where they help good digital monsters fight against evil ones. The game is not directly plot-related to  Digimon Adventure or Digimon Tamers: Brave Tamer games. Instead, it follows more closely the actual episodes of the series. You play as various characters, such as the main hero Taichi and his friend Yamato from the first episodes, as well as heroes from the Digimon Tamers sub-series: Takato, Ruki, and Lee. The game is divided into short episodes, each one of which revives one of the battles in the series. You start with Digimon Tamers, as they venture into the DigiWorld, only to meet the enigmatic digimon named Impmon, who is up to some mischief. 

Each episode can be played as one of several available characters. Each character also has his/her own digimon who fights all the battles. The battles are random and occur while you are navigating your heroes through top-down dungeons. The attacks are displayed as short animé-style sequences. During your turn, you must press the A button repeatedly to increase the power of your attack. The enemy attacks simultaneously, and you have to invest enough power in your attack in order for it to connect.
DESC_ZH:
"数码宝贝大乱斗" 基于热门漫画和动画系列《数码宝贝》改编，在该系列中，普通的日本孩子找到了通往数码世界的途径，在那里他们帮助善良的数码怪兽对抗邪恶的数码怪兽。这款游戏与《数码宝贝大冒险》或《数码宝贝驯兽师：勇敢驯兽师》游戏没有直接的剧情关联。相反，它更紧密地遵循了动画系列的实际剧集。你可以扮演各种角色，比如第一集中的主角太一和他的朋友大和，以及《数码宝贝驯兽师》子系列中的英雄：拓也、留姬和李健良。游戏分为多个短剧集，每一集都重现了系列中的一场战斗。你从数码宝贝驯兽师们冒险进入数码世界开始，却遇到了神秘的数码宝贝妖狐兽，它正在搞一些恶作剧。

每一集都可以选择几个可用角色中的一个来进行游戏。每个角色都有自己的数码宝贝来参与所有战斗。战斗是随机发生的，当你操控英雄在俯视视角的地牢中探索时就会触发。攻击以简短的动画风格画面呈现。在你的回合中，你必须反复按下 A 键来增强攻击的威力。敌人会同时发动攻击，你必须为你的攻击投入足够的威力才能命中敌人。

NAME: Digimon: Battle Spirit
DESC: The plot of Digimon Battle Spirit 2 echoes that of its source series, Digimon Frontier; several children receive messages on their cell phones asking them if they want their lives to change. Some answer yes, some answer no, and five who answer yes are summoned to the Digital World where they receive the ability to become Digimon and fight to end Kerpymon's reign of terror.
DESC_ZH: 《数码宝贝：战斗之魂2》的剧情与原作系列《数码宝贝拯救者》相呼应；几个孩子在手机上收到询问他们是否想改变生活的信息。一些人回答“是”，一些人回答“否”，而回答“是”的五个人被召唤到数码世界，在那里他们获得了变身为数码宝贝的能力，并为终结克普兽的恐怖统治而战。

NAME: Digital Monster - D-Project
DESC: In this, the newest Digimon RPG game for the Wonderswan Color/Crystal, you're once again cast as a kid who's sent to the Digital World to save it (what else?), armed with nothing else but your partner digimon, your tamer know-how, and a machine that someh
DESC_ZH: 在这款为万代彩色/水晶掌机打造的最新数码宝贝角色扮演游戏中，你将再次化身为被送往数码世界拯救它的孩子（还能有什么别的剧情呢？），除了你的搭档数码宝贝、驯兽技巧，以及一台不知……的机器外，你别无依仗。

DESC: Digimon Card Game: Ver. WonderSwan Color is the popular card game based on the anime series for the WonderSwan Color.  As you start the game, you'll talk with Takato. After the card game tutorial (or if you just skip it ), you' ll be in a menu with a list
DESC_ZH: 《数码宝贝卡片游戏：彩色万代掌机版》是一款基于同名动漫系列改编的热门卡片游戏，适用于彩色万代掌机。游戏开始时，你将与拓也对话。完成卡片游戏教程（或者你也可以跳过）后，你将进入一个带有列表的菜单界面。

NAME: Dokodemo Hamster 3: O-Dekake Safuran
NAME_ZH: 大家的仓鼠3：外出大冒险
DESC: This is the third in Bandai's "hamster simulation" series. In this game, you are the "master" of a hamster. The game flows in real time, but you can interfere and perform various actions. The hamster has its own room in a house, with a table and a wheel. There are many things you can do with the hamster. You can take in to a stroll in the forest, go shopping with it, make it play with a ball, and so on. You can also perform actions unrelated to the hamster, like re-decorating the house or writing and painting on a piece of paper. The game features a point-and-click interface: you move your cursor over an object (such as hamster or calendar), which brings up an action menu.
DESC_ZH: 这是万代“仓鼠模拟”系列的第三部作品。在这款游戏中，你是一只仓鼠的“主人”。游戏以实时方式进行，但你可以进行干预并执行各种操作。仓鼠在房子里有自己的房间，里面有一张桌子和一个滚轮。你可以和仓鼠一起做很多事情。你可以带它去森林里散步、和它一起购物、让它玩球等等。你还可以执行与仓鼠无关的操作，比如重新装饰房子或在纸上写字画画。游戏采用点选式界面：你将光标移到一个物体（如仓鼠或日历）上，就会弹出一个操作菜单。

NAME: Dragon Ball
DESC: The game is based on the famous Dragon Ball manga series, starring Son Goku, and spans a long time period of the hero's life. It begins with Son Goku being a mere child and meeting the mysterious Bulma who asks him to add her on her quest to find seven Dr
DESC_ZH: 这款游戏基于著名的《龙珠》漫画系列，主角是孙悟空，涵盖了这位英雄漫长的人生历程。故事始于孙悟空还是个孩子的时候，他遇到了神秘的布尔玛，布尔玛邀请他一同踏上寻找七颗……

NAME: Final Fantasy II
DESC: FINAL FANTASY II is highly anticipated follow-up to the original FINAL FANTASY, released in Japan in 1988. The game features the bitter and beautiful tale of four war-orphaned heroes who become embroiled in a conflict between the hostile Empire of Palamecia and the rebel resistance. By eschewing conventional leveling for a proficiency system that allows players to tailor their characters' growth and incorporating a key term memory system that makes dialogue integral to gameplay, this game sparked the spirit of innovation for which the series has become known. This release also contains the bonus dungeons added to later editions of the game--the Soul of Rebirth and the Arcane Labyrinth.
DESC_ZH: 《最终幻想II》是备受期待的初代《最终幻想》的续作，于1988年在日本发售。游戏讲述了四名战争孤儿英雄的凄美故事，他们卷入了敌对的帕拉米西亚帝国与反抗军之间的冲突。这款游戏摒弃了传统的等级系统，采用了熟练度系统，让玩家能够定制角色的成长，并引入了关键术语记忆系统，使对话成为游戏玩法的重要组成部分，由此点燃了该系列闻名遐迩的创新精神。此次发行还包含了后续版本中添加的额外地下城——重生之魂和神秘迷宫。

NAME: Final Fantasy IV
DESC:
This is the fourth entry in the Final Fantasy series. It was known as Final Fantasy II internationally, because the second and third games were never released outside of Japan. 
 
The military country of Baron is one of the strongest in the land, with a proud army and a majestic air force known as the Red Wings. But, while their armies are kind and loyal, the recent actions of the King are anything but. The young Captain of the Red Wings, Cecil, is ordered to steal a crystal from a village of innocent magicians, and when he questions the actions of his King, Cecil is immediately thrown out of the country and sent off to kill strange monsters. Little does he realize the price the King's actions will pay, and what the true secret of the crystals, and their powers, truly is... 
 
This is the first Final Fantasy game that introduced the famous ATB (active-time battle) system: during the battles, you have a time indicator for each party member that tells you when this character is able to act. If it takes you too long to select a command for this character, the enemy will act without waiting for your turn. The game abandons the job system that was implemented in the first and the third game in favor of pre-set character classes (paladin, white mage, ninja, etc.) assigned to each party member. 
 
The PlayStation version adds a new rendered intro and ending.
DESC_ZH:
这是《最终幻想》系列的第四部作品。在国际上，它曾被称为《最终幻想II》，因为第二部和第三部游戏从未在日本以外地区发行。

军事强国巴伦是这片土地上最强大的国家之一，拥有一支引以为傲的陆军和一支名为“赤翼”的雄伟空军。然而，尽管他们的军队善良忠诚，但国王最近的所作所为却并非如此。“赤翼”的年轻队长塞西尔接到命令，要从一群无辜魔法师的村庄中偷走一颗水晶。当他质疑国王的行为时，塞西尔立刻被逐出了这个国家，并被派去消灭奇怪的怪物。他几乎没有意识到国王的行为将付出怎样的代价，也不知道水晶及其力量的真正秘密是什么……

这是第一款引入著名的ATB（实时战斗）系统的《最终幻想》游戏：在战斗中，每个队员都有一个时间指示器，告诉你该角色何时可以行动。如果你为该角色选择指令的时间过长，敌人将不会等待你的回合就行动。该游戏放弃了第一部和第三部游戏中采用的职业系统，转而采用为每个队员分配预设角色职业（圣骑士、白魔法师、忍者等）的方式。

 PlayStation版增加了全新的动画开场和结局。

NAME: Final Fantasy
DESC:
Hironobu Sakaguchi's Final Fantasy... the first of one of the longest role-playing game series known to mankind. Final Fantasy is the game for the NES console that started it all.

The world is veiled in darkness. Winds don't blow, the seas are stormy, and the earth rots. All people can hope for is that the ancient prophecy will be finally fulfilled. "When the world is veiled in darkness, four warriors will come..." And indeed, they come - the four characters you have previously chosen. Their first quest is to free a princess from the evil Garland, and then the real journey begins...

Final Fantasy is played with an adventuring party rather than with a single character. Before the game starts, the player chooses four characters from six different classes: Fighter, Thief, Black Belt, White Mage, Red Mage, and Black Mage. Which four classes the player chooses for his characters is entirely up to him. He also gives the characters names. 

In the game, the party walks around in a top-down world, visits cities, caves, palaces and other places to buy equipment, rest and get hints and new quests, and fights baddies when they are encountered. Final Fantasy uses a turn-based combat system; the ATB (active-time battle) system from the later installments is not used. In battle, the player gives each character in order a command (attack a particular enemy, cast a spell, use an item, or try to run.) Then the characters and the enemies act in a random order. Attacked enemies and party members lose hit points, dying when they reach zero HP. When all the enemies are defeated, living party members receive experience, eventually gaining a level and improving their stats when enough experience is accumulated. Slain party members can be revived in towns for a price. 

Spells are bought in cities in special shops. The spells are divided into two categories - white magic and black magic. White Mages can only use white magic, Black Mages can only use black magic, and Red Mages can use both. Casting spells in battle uses up magic points, which, like hit points, can be restored by resting in inns.
DESC_ZH:
坂口博信的《最终幻想》……这是人类已知的历史最悠久的角色扮演游戏系列的首部作品。《最终幻想》是在任天堂红白机（NES）上推出的一款游戏，它开启了这一辉煌系列的传奇之旅。

世界被黑暗所笼罩。风不再吹拂，海面狂风暴雨，大地逐渐腐朽。人们唯一的希望，就是古老的预言能够最终实现。“当世界被黑暗笼罩时，四位勇士将会降临……” 的确，他们来了 —— 就是你之前选择的四位角色。他们的首个任务是从邪恶的加兰德手中解救一位公主，随后，真正的冒险之旅便拉开了帷幕……

《最终幻想》采用的是团队冒险模式，而非单人角色作战。游戏开始前，玩家可以从六种不同职业中挑选出四位角色：战士、盗贼、武道家、白魔法师、红魔法师和黑魔法师。玩家完全可以根据自己的喜好来选择角色的职业，还能为角色命名。

在游戏中，队伍会在一个俯瞰视角的世界中四处探索，他们会前往城市、洞穴、宫殿等地方，购买装备、休息、获取线索以及接受新的任务。一旦遭遇敌人，便会展开战斗。《最终幻想》采用的是回合制战斗系统，后续作品中出现的主动时间战斗（ATB）系统在这部作品中并未使用。战斗时，玩家需要依次为每个角色下达指令（攻击特定敌人、施展魔法、使用物品或尝试逃跑）。之后，角色和敌人会按照随机顺序行动。被攻击的敌人和队员会损失生命值，当生命值降为零时，便会死亡。当所有敌人都被击败后，存活的队员将获得经验值。当积累了足够的经验后，队员就会升级，各项属性也会得到提升。阵亡的队员可以在城镇中花费一定代价复活。

魔法可以在城市中的特殊商店购买。魔法分为两大类 —— 白魔法和黑魔法。白魔法师只能使用白魔法，黑魔法师只能使用黑魔法，而红魔法师则两者皆可使用。在战斗中施展魔法会消耗魔法值，和生命值一样，魔法值也可以通过在旅馆休息来恢复。

NAME: Front Mission
DESC:
In the future, many military forces are dependent on huge mech robots, called Wanzers (Walking Panzers) for combat. At Huffman Island, located in the the pacific ocean, wanzers are deployed by both the USN (United States of the New Continent) and the OCU (Oceana Community Union), who dispute ownership over the island.  One night, the OCU forces stage a covert recon mission on a facility located in Larcus, a USN-held territory and weapons facility. Lead by a soldier named Roid, this mission was entirely unofficial and violated the peace treaty. During the mission, USN forces lead by Commander Driscoll appeared and ambushed the OCU soldiers. During the combat, Roid's fiance, Karen is killed and the USN facility is blown up; placing the blame on the OCU. This became known as the "Larcus Incident" and the OCU denied all knowledge of it's soldiers actions. Ultimately it would be a leading cause to the second Huffman War. 

One year later, the war is underway and Huffman island is under provisional control of the OCU, but with a weakened military unable to defend against USN attacks. The soldiers involved involved in the Larcus Incident have all been discharged and disgraced. Roid spends his time fighting as a gladiator in the Wanzer fighting arena before being approached by a mysterious man. Colonel Olson has found out about Roid's history and wants him to command a mercenary unit he is assembling on behalf of the OCU, dubbed "Carrion Crow". Convincing Roid that Driscoll is still out there on the island, Roid agrees.

Front Mission is a turn-based strategy RPG played from an isometric perspective. Players progress in the story through large strategic battles involving multiple units and cutscenes between them. At certain places, usually towns, the player can visit multiple locations including bars and shops, and talk to people. Shops are also found to purchase new weaponry, parts and make repairs. In combat, each Wanzer robot is a seperate unit and, has a large variety of weapons and attack styles depending on what's equipped. Units get experience for defeating enemies and also for using various techniques. The more an attack is used, the more powerful it becomes.
DESC_ZH:
在未来，许多军事力量依靠被称为“万泽”（步行战车）的巨型机甲机器人进行战斗。在位于太平洋的赫夫曼岛，新大陆合众国（USN）和大洋洲共同体联盟（OCU）都部署了万泽，双方对该岛的所有权存在争议。 一天晚上，OCU部队对位于USN控制区拉克斯的一处设施和武器库进行了秘密侦察任务。这次任务由一名名叫罗伊德的士兵带队，完全是未经官方授权的，并且违反了和平条约。在任务期间，由德里斯科尔指挥官率领的USN部队出现并伏击了OCU士兵。战斗中，罗伊德的未婚妻凯伦被杀，USN设施被炸毁，责任被归咎于OCU。这一事件被称为“拉克斯事件”，OCU否认对其士兵的行动知情。最终，这成为第二次赫夫曼战争的主要导火索。

一年后，战争爆发，赫夫曼岛暂时由OCU控制，但OCU军队实力削弱，无法抵御USN的攻击。参与拉克斯事件的士兵都被开除并蒙羞。罗伊德在成为角斗士，在万泽战斗竞技场中战斗时，被一个神秘人找上了门。奥尔森上校了解到罗伊德的过往，希望他指挥一支由他代表OCU组建的雇佣兵部队，这支部队被称为“腐肉乌鸦”。奥尔森上校让罗伊德相信德里斯科尔仍在岛上，罗伊德同意了。

《前线任务》是一款从等轴视角进行的回合制策略角色扮演游戏。玩家通过涉及多个单位的大型战略战斗以及战斗之间的过场动画来推进故事。在某些地方，通常是城镇，玩家可以访问包括酒吧和商店在内的多个地点，并与人们交谈。还可以在商店购买新武器、零件并进行维修。在战斗中，每台万泽机器人都是一个独立的单位，根据装备的不同，拥有各种各样的武器和攻击方式。单位在击败敌人和使用各种技能时会获得经验值。攻击使用得越多，威力就越大。

Sega's classic arcade beat-'em-up game, Golden Axe puts in the shoes of one of three heroes, each with his own reason for trying to overthrow the evil rule of Death-Adder, who - along with his forces of darkness - kidnapped and imprisoned the King and his daughter and stole the legendary Golden Axe.

DESC_ZH:
世嘉经典的街机清版动作游戏《战斧》让你化身为三位英雄之一，每位英雄都有自己的理由去推翻死亡蝰蛇的邪恶统治。死亡蝰蛇及其黑暗势力绑架并囚禁了国王和他的女儿，还偷走了传奇的战斧。

NAME: Guilty Gear Petit 2
DESC: In 22th century, scientists found a way to create artificial beings whom they called "gears". These gears were very powerful, but did not have wills of their own, and were completely obedient to the humans. However, a gear named Justice was able to free himself from the control and led a rebellion against the humans. Since then, the humanity lived in fear that the gears will one day gain the power on the Earth. For that purpose, the Sacred Order of the Holy Knights organized fighting tournaments to find out who is strong enough to face the renegade gears.
DESC_ZH: 在22世纪，科学家们找到了创造人造生命的方法，并将其称为“机巧”。这些机巧非常强大，但没有自己的意志，完全服从人类。然而，一个名叫正义的机巧成功摆脱了控制，并带领机巧们反抗人类。从那时起，人类一直担心机巧有一天会统治地球。为此，神圣骑士团举办了格斗锦标赛，以找出有足够实力对抗叛逆机巧的人。

NAME: Guilty Gear Petit
DESC: The game takes place in 22th century. Scientists developed a new technique that allowed them to merge the DNA of humans and animals, producing powerful creatures known as "gears". The characters of the game participate in a tournament, the winner of which would face a gear who went out of control and is threatening to lead a gear rebellion against the humans. The game allows you to play as familiar characters from Guilty Gear series, such as the main hero Sol Badguy, who has a certain connection to the gears, and his rival, the leader of the Holy Knights named Ky Kiske. It also introduces a new character, the nurse Fanny, who fights with a syringe and has a mysterious connection to the genius surgeon, and later serial murderer, Dr. Baldhead.
DESC_ZH:
游戏设定在22世纪。科学家们研发出一种新技术，能够将人类和动物的DNA融合，创造出被称为“齿轮兽”的强大生物。游戏中的角色们参加一场锦标赛，获胜者将迎战一只失控的齿轮兽，这只齿轮兽正威胁着要带领齿轮兽们反抗人类。

在游戏中，你可以操控《罪恶装备》系列中大家熟悉的角色，比如与齿轮兽有着某种关联的主角索尔·巴德基，以及他的对手、圣骑兵团团长凯·奇斯。游戏还引入了一名新角色——护士范妮，她使用注射器战斗，并且与天才外科医生、后来的连环杀手光头博士有着神秘的联系。

NAME: GunPey EX
DESC:
Direct sequel to the original Gunpey on the WonderSwan, Gunpey EX adds a number of new elements to the classic; most notably, color.

In addition to earning points for completing a line across the field you will now earn points if those lines are of a matching color. Previously only gray lines were possible now red, blue, and green lines appear.

Gunpey EX has the same modes as the previous game, except a story mode. Time Attack mode where one has to eliminate as many tiles as possible in two of five minutes. Endless mode give the player unlimited time to crank out whatever score they desire. Stage mode presents a set number of tiles to remove in a given time. Puzzle mode puts the player in the situation of having to remove a certain group of tiles, the player can change the color of the lines here when they swap their tiles positions.

A link mode is available to play against another human with a WonderSwan and Gunpey EX. 

This game could access the internet through a wireless phone and the WonderGate where it was able to interact with an online high score board.
DESC_ZH:
作为万代神奇天鹅掌机上原版《方块射击》的直接续作，《方块射击EX》为这款经典游戏增添了许多新元素，其中最显著的就是颜色。

除了在游戏区域完成一行连线可获得积分外，现在如果这些连线颜色相同，你也能获得积分。此前只有灰色的连线，现在红色、蓝色和绿色的连线也会出现。

《方块射击EX》的游戏模式与前作基本相同，只是没有故事模式。计时挑战模式要求玩家在2到5分钟内尽可能多地消除方块。无尽模式则给予玩家无限的时间来达成他们想要的分数。关卡模式要求玩家在规定时间内消除一定数量的方块。解谜模式让玩家处于必须消除特定一组方块的情境中，玩家在这里交换方块位置时可以改变连线的颜色。

游戏还提供了联机模式，玩家可以与另一位持有神奇天鹅掌机和《方块射击EX》的玩家对战。

这款游戏可以通过无线电话和神奇网关接入互联网，与在线高分榜进行互动。

FILE: Hanjuku Hero - Ah, Sekai yo Hanjuku Nare...!! (Japan) (Rev 1).zip
NAME: Hanjuku Hero - Ah, Sekai yo Hanjuku Nare...!!
NAME_ZH: 软弱英雄 - 啊，世界啊，变得软弱吧……!!
DESC:
Hanjuku Eiyu is set in a semi-comical universe called the Egg World, populated by two nations: Hanjuku and Kanjuku, or soft-boiled and hard-boiled eggs, respectively. You take the role of the commander of the Hanjuku army, and your goal is to guide it successfully through a series of events (called "tales"), capturing enemy castles and defeating the bosses of the Kanjuku army. 

This is a real-time war strategy game. The game time is divided into months, each month taking a few minutes of real time. You control the hero and his generals, each one commanding units of foot soldiers. You send your army commanders through the world map to capture enemy castles. Once all the castles are captured, a new construction appears on the map, where the level boss resides, and your final goal in the chapter (tale) is to defeat this boss. Once you run into an enemy, an automatic battle sequence occurs, which you can interrupt, assigning commands to your army. Both Hanjuku and Kanjuku armies can summon powerful creatures called Egg Monsters, who can fight against a whole army or against each other in turn-based combat. Each month a "monthly event" occurs, such as changes in the land, earthquake, etc. Random events also pop out, during which you can buy supplies for your army.
DESC_ZH:
《软弱英雄》设定在一个名为“鸡蛋世界”的半搞笑宇宙中，这里有两个国家：软弱国和强硬国，分别由溏心蛋和全熟蛋组成。你将扮演软弱国军队的指挥官，你的目标是成功引导军队经历一系列事件（称为“故事”），攻占敌方城堡并击败强硬国军队的首领。

这是一款实时战争策略游戏。游戏时间以月为单位划分，每个月在现实中大约持续几分钟。你控制英雄及其将领，每位将领指挥一支步兵部队。你派遣军队指挥官在世界地图上行动，以攻占敌方城堡。一旦所有城堡都被攻占，地图上就会出现一个新建筑，关卡首领就驻守在此，你在该章节（故事）的最终目标就是击败这个首领。一旦遭遇敌人，就会自动触发战斗环节，你可以中断战斗，为军队下达命令。软弱国和强硬国的军队都可以召唤名为“鸡蛋怪兽”的强大生物，它们可以与整支军队作战，也可以在回合制战斗中相互对抗。每个月都会发生一次“月度事件”，例如地形变化、地震等。还会随机出现一些事件，在此期间你可以为军队购买补给品。

NAME: Hataraku Chocobo
DESC: Hataraku Chocobo is a farm simulation game where you take on the role of a chocobo breeder who has his work cut out for him!
DESC_ZH: 《工作的陆行鸟》是一款农场模拟游戏，在游戏中你将扮演一名陆行鸟饲养员，有大量工作等着你去完成！

NAME: Hunter X Hunter - Greed Island
NAME_ZH: 全职猎人 - 贪婪之岛
DESC: When you encounter the enemy, you rush into a command selection type turn system battle on a 8x3 field mas
DESC_ZH: 当你遇到敌人时，你将在一个8×3的战场上进入指令选择式回合制战斗。

NAME: Hunter X Hunter - Michibikareshi Mono
NAME_ZH: 全职猎人 - 被引导之人
DESC:
The plot of 'Hunter x Hunter' follows Gon, a boy who twelve years before the story that Togashi tells us was abandoned by his father Ging Freecss, who left him in the hands of his aunt Mito on Whale Island. 
 
Gon always thought that his parents had died, but one day he discovers that this is not the case thanks to his father's apprentice, Kite. He tells her that not only is his father alive, but that he is one of the best hunters (elite people credited with searching for secret treasures, hunting exotic beasts, and even people) in the world. 
 
Knowing this, Gon is motivated to leave his home on Isla Ballena and take his hunter exams. To be part of that elite you need to pass six exams where they will test your skills and master Nen (Mental Strength). 
 
Nen is a technique that allows a living being to use and manipulate its own vital energy (aura), learning these techniques is the last step to become a professional hunter, thanks to this they can improve their physical attacks or objects depending on the user's aura.
DESC_ZH:
《全职猎人》的剧情围绕着主角小杰展开。在富坚义博所讲述的故事开始的十二年前，小杰的父亲金·富力士将他托付给鲸鱼岛上的姨妈米特后离开了他。

小杰一直以为父母已经离世，但有一天，父亲的徒弟奇犽告诉他并非如此。奇犽不仅告知小杰他的父亲还活着，而且他是世界上最顶尖的猎人之一（猎人是一群被赋予寻找秘密宝藏、捕猎珍稀野兽甚至追捕人类等任务的精英）。

得知此事后，小杰受到鼓舞，离开鲸鱼岛的家，踏上了猎人考试之旅。要成为猎人精英，需要通过六项考试，这些考试将考验你的技能并考察你对念（精神力量）的掌握。

念是一种让生物能够运用和操控自身生命能量（灵气）的技巧。学习这些技巧是成为专业猎人的最后一步，凭借念，使用者可以根据自身灵气的特点增强物理攻击或赋予物品特殊能力。

DESC: The story of Hunter X Hunter focuses on a young boy named Gon Freecss, who one day discovers that the father he had always been told was dead was ali
DESC_ZH: 《全职猎人》的故事围绕着一个名叫杰·富力士的小男孩展开。有一天，他发现一直被告知已去世的父亲其实还活着。

NAME: Inuyasha - Fuuun Emaki
DESC:
In the previous game ?Kagome no Sengoku Nikki?, the game was played from the viewpoint of Kagome. This time you can play the game from the perspective of Maitreya, Samurai, Cloisonne, Steel Fang, Naraku, and Seiseimaru. For example, even in the same scene, it is possible to play from the viewpoint of Kagome the first time, the second time from the viewpoint of Inuyasha, and the third time from the viewpoint of Seiseimaru. 
 
Furthermore, the battle scene of this work is action. A support system has also been added, so you can experience the powerful battle of Inuyasha. In addition, an original character newly created by the original author, Rumiko Takahashi, will also appear!
DESC_ZH:
在上一款游戏《戈薇的战国日记》中，游戏是从戈薇的视角进行游玩的。这次你可以从弥勒、武士、七宝、钢牙、奈落和杀生丸的视角来玩游戏。例如，即使是在同一个场景中，第一次可以从戈薇的视角游玩，第二次从犬夜叉的视角，第三次从杀生丸的视角。

此外，本作的战斗场景为动作类型。还增加了支援系统，让你可以体验到犬夜叉的激烈战斗。另外，原作者高桥留美子新创作的原创角色也将登场！

NAME: Inuyasha - Kagome no Sengoku Nikki
NAME_ZH: 犬夜叉 - 戈薇的战国日记
DESC:
Inuyasha: Kagome no Sengoku Nikki is a "Fureai Adventure" where the player becomes the heroine Kagome Higurashi and communicates with Inuyasha. The story of Inuyasha changes depending on how the players interact. 
 
The game is divided into the ?Inuyasha Forest? part that contacts with Inuyasha using commands such as ?Item? and ?Topic?, and the ?Search? part that advances the story while adventuring with friends. If you do many events that occur in the ?Exploration? part, the topics and items in the ?Inuyasha Forest? part will increase, and the interaction with Inuyasha will become even more fulfilling. 
 
In addition, since the clock is built in the cassette, the game progresses in real time while linking with the actual time. Of course, many famous scenes of the original are recorded during the game, and familiar characters and enemy monsters appear. 
 
There are many original episodes such as the appearance of the original character ?Itachi no Shippu? as a rival to Inuyasha. You can also review stories in the ?Album Diary? and enjoy mini-games such as ?Hide and Seek?.
DESC_ZH:
《犬夜叉：戈薇的战国日记》是一款“互动冒险”游戏，玩家将化身为女主角日暮戈薇，与犬夜叉进行交流。犬夜叉的故事走向会根据玩家的互动方式而改变。

游戏分为“犬夜叉之森”部分和“探索”部分。在“犬夜叉之森”部分，玩家可以使用“物品”和“话题”等指令与犬夜叉进行互动；在“探索”部分，玩家将与伙伴们一同冒险，推动故事发展。如果玩家在“探索”部分触发了许多事件，“犬夜叉之森”部分的话题和物品将会增加，与犬夜叉的互动也会更加丰富。

此外，由于卡带内置了时钟，游戏会与实际时间同步，以实时方式进行。当然，游戏中收录了许多原著中的经典场景，熟悉的角色和敌方怪物也会登场。

游戏中有许多原创剧情，比如原创角色“鼬之疾风”作为犬夜叉的对手登场。玩家还可以在“相册日记”中回顾故事，也能享受“捉迷藏”等小游戏。

NAME: Inuyasha - Kagome no Yume Nikki
NAME_ZH: 犬夜叉 - 戈薇的梦幻日记
DESC:
The third Inuyasha game Kagome no Yume Nikki is a sequel to the first Kagome no Sengoku Nikki. As you can see from the word ?Yume? in the title, ?Dream? is an important factor in this ?Dream Diary?. 
 
The basic system of the game is the same as Sengoku Nikki, and the story is advanced while repeating the "contact part" and "adventure part", but this time a "dream event" occurs at the end of the day. 
 
In "Dream Event", you can see situations that cannot be seen in anime and manga, as well as modern events that were requested in the previous work. This time, the enemy is also named after the dream. The enemy this time is an original character called Yakumo, a half-witch who manipulates dreams, and a battle in the dream world will be unfolded. 
 
The game has a lot of original scenes, and the total number of events is 2.5 times higher than the previous work Sengoku Nikki.
DESC_ZH:
第三部犬夜叉游戏《戈薇的梦幻日记》是第一部《戈薇的战国日记》的续作。从标题中的“Yume（梦）”一词可以看出，“梦”是这本“梦幻日记”中的重要元素。

游戏的基本系统与《战国日记》相同，故事在重复“交流环节”和“冒险环节”的过程中推进，但这次每天结束时会发生“梦境事件”。

在“梦境事件”中，你可以看到动漫和漫画中看不到的场景，以及前作中所提及的现代事件。这次，敌人的命名也与梦有关。此次的敌人是一个名为八云的原创角色，她是一个操纵梦境的半巫女，游戏将展开一场梦境世界的战斗。

游戏中有很多原创场景，事件总数比前作《战国日记》多2.5倍。

NAME: Judgement Silversword - Rebirth Edition
DESC:
In your space fighter, the S-AIXAK, you'll be going up against the minions of the Judgement Silversword. Starting from a small space station above the earth your lone fighter will travail the bullet filled cosmos, always a shot away from death, to achieve this goal. 
 
Judgement Silversword is a vertically scrolling shooter in which wave upon wave of multifarious of opposing craft will try to take you down with bullets, bombs, lasers, or even their own fuselages. Using the Y-Buttons as a directional pad and the X-Buttons for your weaponry you'll try your hand at completing the S-AIXAKs destiny.
DESC_ZH:
驾驶你的太空战机 S - AIXAK，你将与审判银剑的爪牙展开对决。从地球上方的一个小型空间站出发，你驾驶着孤独的战机，穿梭于布满子弹的宇宙中，时刻与死亡擦肩而过，只为达成目标。

《审判银剑》是一款纵向卷轴射击游戏，一波又一波形形色色的敌方战机将试图用子弹、炸弹、激光，甚至是它们自身的机身来击落你。你可以使用 Y 键作为方向键，X 键来操控武器，尝试完成 S - AIXAK 的使命。

FILE: Kidou Senshi Gundam - Giren no Yabou - Tokubetsu Hen - Aoki Hoshi no Hasha (Japan).zip
NAME: Kidou Senshi Gundam - Giren no Yabou - Tokubetsu H
NAME_ZH: 机动战士高达 - 基连的野望 - 特别版H
DESC:
The player chooses either College Garma Zabi or College Ma Kube. From the viewpoint of two people who are Earth forces, the game advances with an aim of becoming the earth champion. 
 
The heart of the game is the Executive Meeting system. At the meeting, various proposals can be discussed and decided with other executives. You can also make remarks using commands and bargaining, including advanced negotiations.
DESC_ZH:
玩家可以选择加尔玛·扎比上校或马·库贝上校。从这两位地球联邦军成员的视角出发，游戏以成为地球霸主为目标推进。

游戏的核心是“干部会议”系统。在会议中，玩家可以与其他干部讨论并决定各种提案。还能使用命令和讨价还价等方式发表意见，包括进行高级谈判。

NAME: Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed
DESC:
Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed is an action game with 8 stages. The player controls the Strike Gundam, while trying to destroy Gin and Shigu of Zaft's mobile suits and enemy Gundam on the stages of colonies, outer space and desert! 
 
Strike Gundam can be modified with optional parts according to the situation, so consider the characteristics of each equipment, such as focusing on mobility with an ale striker pack, close combat with a sword striker pack or firepower with a launcher striker pack. 
 
After clearing the game with Strike Gundam, you can play the side stories of Aegis Gundam, Duel Gundam, Blitz Gundam, Buster Gundam, and the new Freedom Gundam.
DESC_ZH:
《机动战士高达SEED》是一款包含8个关卡的动作游戏。玩家操控强袭高达，在殖民地、外太空和沙漠等关卡中，尝试摧毁扎夫特的吉恩和西古机动战士以及敌方高达！

强袭高达可以根据情况加装可选部件进行改装，因此要考虑每种装备的特点，例如使用空战强袭背包专注于机动性，使用剑战强袭背包进行近身战斗，或者使用炮战强袭背包提升火力。

使用强袭高达通关游戏后，你可以游玩天盾高达、决斗高达、暴风高达、强袭炮装型高达以及新型自由高达的支线剧情。

NAME: Kidou Senshi Gundam Vol. 1 - Side 7
NAME_ZH: 机动战士高达 第1卷 - 第七区
DESC: Kidou Senshi Gundam Vol. 1 SIDE7, is a strategy game that recreates several episodes of the original animated series "Mobile Suit Gundam".
DESC_ZH: 《机动战士高达 第1卷 第七区》是一款策略游戏，重现了原创动画《机动战士高达》的多个剧集。

NAME: Kidou Senshi Gundam Vol. 2 - Jaburo
NAME_ZH: 机动战士高达 第2卷 - 贾布罗
DESC: The second in a trilogy of Wonderswan games that are based on the original Mobile Suit Gundam anime. This game covers episodes 13-30 of the show.
DESC_ZH: 这是基于原版《机动战士高达》动画改编的万代WonderSwan掌机三部曲游戏中的第二部。本游戏涵盖了动画第13 - 30集的内容。

FILE: Kidou Senshi Gundam Vol. 3 - A Baoa Qu (Japan).zip
NAME: Kidou Senshi Gundam Vol. 3 - A Baoa Qu
NAME_ZH: 机动战士高达 第3卷 - 阿·巴瓦·库
DESC: Many heroes have fought through the eras. Soldiers play a sonorous melody, their traces shaping the course of history. Even now, their stories shall be read from a corner of the Pantheon. For those with regrets in their hearts, the battle begins. This is a tale of heroes who fell in space.
DESC_ZH: 历代以来，众多英雄投身战斗。战士们奏响激昂旋律，他们的足迹塑造了历史的走向。即便时至今日，他们的故事仍能在万神殿的一角被传颂。对于那些心中留有遗憾之人，战斗已然打响。这是一个关于陨落于宇宙的英雄们的故事。

NAME: Kinnikuman IIsei - Choujin Seisenshi
NAME_ZH: 筋肉人二世 - 超人战士
DESC: Kinnikuman Nisei: Ch?jin Seisenshi is an RPG game based in the Kinnikuman/Ultimate Muscle series, although the plot of the game bears no relation to any of the original series' sagas. Here you will take the role of an anonymous guy -created specially for this game- named "The Mask" (although you can change his name for one of your choice) and will have to defeat all the characters of the Kinnikuman universe that appear in your way.
DESC_ZH: 《筋肉人二世：超人战士》是一款基于《筋肉人》/《终极肌肉》系列的角色扮演游戏，不过游戏剧情与原系列的任何一部传奇故事都没有关联。在这里，你将扮演一个专门为这款游戏打造的无名角色，名叫“面具男”（你也可以将他的名字改成你喜欢的），并且必须击败出现在你面前的《筋肉人》世界里的所有角色。

NAME: Kinnikuman IIsei - Dream Tag Match
NAME_ZH: 筋肉人二世 - 梦幻双打赛
DESC: Kinnikuman Nisei: Dream Tag Match is a wrestling game based in the manga/anime series of the same name. It features the cast of Kinnikuman Nisei (known in the West as "Kinnikuman: Second Generations") in a battle to victory. The main story follows Kid Muscle, the prince of Muscle Planet and son of King Muscle (the early protagonist of the series), who fought for peace and justice in the Universe. Kid has now been chosen as King Muscle's predecessor in wrestling history, and must now defeat every opponent that comes his way, stopping total domination by the Demon Manufacturing Plant, an evil wrestling league which wants to take control of the universe, and the loss of his fanbase, which includes the love of his life, Roxanne.
DESC_ZH: 《筋肉人二世：梦幻双打赛》是一款基于同名漫画/动画系列改编的摔跤游戏。游戏中，《筋肉人二世》（在西方被称为《筋肉人：第二代》）的角色们将展开一场争夺胜利的战斗。游戏的主要剧情围绕着肌肉王子小子展开，他是肌肉星王子，也是肌肉王（该系列前期主角）的儿子，曾为宇宙的和平与正义而战。如今，小子被选为肌肉王在摔跤历史上的接班人，他必须击败每一个挡在他面前的对手，阻止恶魔制造工厂的全面统治。恶魔制造工厂是一个邪恶的摔跤联盟，妄图控制宇宙，同时他还要避免失去自己的粉丝群体，其中包括他一生所爱——罗克珊。

NAME: Kurupara!
DESC: Kurupara! is a puzzle game, in which panels arranged in a 5x5 field are rearranged and erased. To turn off the panel, you must first arrange three or more of the same pattern. Then, when three panels are arranged, the pattern drawn on the surface disappears and the panel is turned over. And if you put three or more panels that are turned over again, the pattern on the back will disappear and the panel will disappear. Repeat this and all the panels disappear to clear the stage.
DESC_ZH: 《咕噜啪啦！》是一款益智游戏，玩家需要重新排列并消除排列在 5x5 区域中的方块。要消除方块，你必须先将三个或更多相同图案的方块排列在一起。然后，当三个方块排列好后，表面绘制的图案会消失，方块会翻面。如果你再次将三个或更多翻面后的方块排列在一起，背面的图案会消失，方块也会随之消失。重复这个过程，直到所有方块都消失，即可通关。

NAME: Last Alive
DESC: Perhaps not the most 'Adventureous" adventure game.
DESC_ZH: 这或许并非最具“冒险性”的冒险游戏。

NAME: Makai Toushi Sa-Ga
DESC: This remake of SaGa features several changes compared to the original. The graphics have been updated to 16-bit level, with new sprites and artwork drawn by Toshiyuki Itahana. New animated sequences have been added to the game as well as an intro sequence. Other new features include the ability to see what a monster would change to if they eat a new meat ahead of time, a bestiary, and the ability to re-target enemies when a previous target is slain by another character. There's even an option to play a straight port of the original Game Boy version as well.
DESC_ZH: 这款《萨迦》的重制版与原版相比有几处改动。画面已升级到16位水平，新的角色形象和美术作品由板鼻俊之绘制。游戏中添加了新的动画片段以及开场动画。其他新特性包括能够提前查看怪物吃下新的肉类后会变成什么样子、新增了怪物图鉴，以及当之前的目标被其他角色击杀后可以重新选择敌人。甚至还有直接游玩原版Game Boy版本的选项。

NAME: Meitantei Conan : Yuugure no Oujo
NAME_ZH: 名侦探柯南：黄昏的公主
DESC: Cursed jewels, the party, and murder. And in the middle of it all, our shrank detective, Kudou Shinichi, who now goes by the name of Conan Edogawa. The player gathers clues by listening to other characters, gathering key words, and most importantly, deducing the truth behind the mystery. The game can be linked with the previously released Meitantei Conan titles for WonderSwan which will effectively alter the story and add a branching path. Notebook with data is compatible with the one from previous works can also be imported.
DESC_ZH: 被诅咒的珠宝、派对和谋杀案。而在这一切的中心，是我们变小的侦探工藤新一，现在化名为江户川柯南。玩家通过倾听其他角色的对话、收集关键词，最重要的是，推理出谜团背后的真相来收集线索。这款游戏可以与之前为万代WonderSwan掌机发行的《名侦探柯南》系列游戏进行联动，这将有效地改变故事走向并增加分支剧情。带有数据的笔记本若与前作兼容，也可以导入。

NAME: Memories Off - Festa
DESC: A donjara game with Memories Off characters.
DESC_ZH: 一款以《秋之回忆》角色为主角的麻将游戏。

NAME: Mikeneko Holmes - Ghost Panic
NAME_ZH: 猫侦探福尔摩斯：幽灵恐慌
DESC:
Mikeneko Holmes: Ghost Panic is a mystery game based on popular Mikeneko Holmes novels by Akagawa Jir?, a Japanese mystery novel writer. The protagonist in this mystery story is none other than Holmes, the cat, not Sherlock, who got involved in a murder incident in an old castle somewhere in southern part of Germany, which is nowadays used as a sightseeing hotel. Ancient legends about witches, demons and strange phenomena are well known in the area, which adds a touch of supernatural to be feared of, if any of it true. 
 
This game is made to play as a sound comic, meaning the artwork is made as an interactive comic book which progresses the story, yet allowing the player to enter choices which will take the story in a different direction and lead to one of several different endings.
DESC_ZH:
《猫侦探福尔摩斯：幽灵恐慌》是一款推理游戏，其灵感源自日本推理小说家赤川次郎广受欢迎的《猫侦探福尔摩斯》系列小说。在这个推理故事中，主角并非夏洛克·福尔摩斯，而是一只名叫福尔摩斯的猫。它卷入了德国南部一座古老城堡里发生的一起谋杀案，如今这座城堡已被改造成观光酒店。当地流传着关于女巫、恶魔和奇异现象的古老传说，倘若这些传说属实，便为故事增添了一丝令人胆寒的超自然色彩。

这款游戏以有声漫画的形式呈现，即游戏画面如同互动漫画书一般推动剧情发展，同时玩家可以做出选择，使故事走向不同方向，并导向多个不同结局之一。

NAME: Mr. Driller
DESC:
Mr Driller's world has been covered with mysterious blocks. Armed with only a mighty drill, you'll have to dig your way down to safety before his air supply runs out!
Mr Driller is a real-time puzzle game that relies solely on quick-thinking and a bit of planning.  Gameplay is a combination of Tetris and Boulder Dash: You have to drill down through multi-colored blocks to reach the bottom while avoiding the consequences of reckless drilling (blocks may fall on you and crush you).
DESC_ZH:
钻地先生的世界被神秘方块覆盖了。你只能凭借一把强力钻头，在他的空气耗尽之前，一路向下挖掘到安全地带！
钻地先生是一款实时解谜游戏，完全依赖快速思考和一定的规划能力。游戏玩法结合了《俄罗斯方块》和《挖宝小子》的特点：你必须钻透各种颜色的方块到达底部，同时避免鲁莽钻探带来的后果（方块可能会砸到你并把你压扁）。

NAME: Namco Super Wars
DESC:
Namco Super Wars is a tactical role-playing game developed by Namco and published by Bandai for the Wonderswan Color. It is a crossover game, featuring characters from several classic Namco titles. 
 
The game is played on a square grid, on which both the player's and computer's units are placed. Each side takes turns moving and making actions with their units. Every character has a variety of attacks and special moves that can be selected when performing an action. Some of these consume Spirit Points, which slowly regenerate each turn. The game is divided into stages. Between each stage, the player is able to visit a shop and prepare his units before starting the next stage. Unlike most RPGs, characters do not gain levels for directly defeating opponents. Instead, completion of a map will reward the players with a number of level ups, which they can then distribute among their units as they wish.
DESC_ZH:
《南梦宫超级战争》是一款由南梦宫开发、万代发行的战术角色扮演游戏，适用于彩色万代掌机。这是一款跨界游戏，包含了多款南梦宫经典游戏的角色。

游戏在方形网格上进行，玩家和电脑的单位都放置在网格中。双方轮流移动并操控各自的单位进行行动。每个角色都有多种攻击和特殊技能，在行动时可以选择使用。其中一些技能会消耗灵力值，灵力值每回合会缓慢恢复。游戏分为多个关卡。在每关之间，玩家可以前往商店，为下一关准备自己的单位。与大多数角色扮演游戏不同，角色不会因直接击败对手而升级。相反，完成一张地图后，玩家会获得一定数量的升级点数，然后可以根据自己的意愿分配给各个单位。

NAME: Naruto - Konoha Ninpouchou
NAME_ZH: 火影忍者 - 木叶忍宝传
DESC: In this RPG you play as Naruto Uzumaki, who has fallen from the Ninja School Academy. Although Naruto is a problem child in the village of Kinoha Hidden, he has a dream of becoming a ninja that surpasses his predecessor by inheriting the title of ?Hokage?, the highest rank of Shinobi.
DESC_ZH: 在这款角色扮演游戏中，你将扮演从忍者学校辍学的漩涡鸣人。尽管鸣人在木叶隐村是个问题儿童，但他怀揣着一个梦想，那就是继承忍者的最高头衔“火影”，成为超越前辈的忍者。

NAME: Pocket no Naka no Doraemon
DESC:
Doraemon intends to return to Nobita's room. However, the place where he got back by mistake was your (the player) room. Doraemon, who feels the same wavelength between you and Nobita, decides to stay in your room for a while. 
 
Doraemon gives you a minidora as a proof of friendship. There are four types of minidoras: ?Nobita type? who only takes a nap, timid ?Sune husband type?, gentle ?Shizuka-chan type?, and ?Gian type? of Ramenbo. You choose one of these and grow a minidora with Doraemon. 
 
Minidora grows while watching the conversation between the player and Doraemon. Then, until the day when we part ways with Doraemon, the days spent by three people (player, Doraemon, Minidora) determine the ending of the game.
DESC_ZH:
哆啦A梦打算回到大雄的房间。然而，他误打误撞回到的地方却是你（玩家）的房间。哆啦A梦感觉到你和大雄之间有着相同的气场，于是决定在你的房间里暂留一段时间。

哆啦A梦送给你一只迷你哆啦作为友谊的证明。迷你哆啦有四种类型：只会睡午觉的“大雄型”、胆小的“强夫君型”、温柔的“静香酱型”，以及爱吃拉面的“胖虎型”。你可以从这些类型中选择一只，和哆啦A梦一起养育迷你哆啦。

迷你哆啦会在观察玩家与哆啦A梦的对话过程中成长。然后，直到与哆啦A梦分别的那一天，三个人（玩家、哆啦A梦、迷你哆啦）共同度过的时光将决定游戏的结局。

NAME: Rhyme Rider Kerorican
DESC:
You play as the rhyme rider Kerorcian, a vivacious space girl with a large frog helmet, as she skips to the music through the games four stages. The games music is largely comprised of jazzy techno pieces.
Kerorcian skips down a set line while randomly placed enemies and obstacles appear before her. Various button combos will avoid certain obstacles, although a "one-button" easy mode is available. When you avoid an obstacle a note will sound, clearing long chains of obstacles will result in funky melodies popping up inside the song that is playing. This gameplay is reminiscent of the studios earlier game Vib Ribbon.  
Some of the obstacles are interactive, such as a rocket one can jump on and ride a short distance, others can merely be kicked out of the way or jumped over.
Occasionally a crown will appear over an obstacle, if you successfully clear it you will briefly soar over the stage avoiding anything that might have been in your path. This is especially common before obstacles that might require outlandish button combos.
DESC_ZH:
你将扮演韵律骑手可洛莉卡，她是一位戴着巨大青蛙头盔的活泼太空女孩，在游戏的四个关卡中跟着音乐跳跃前行。游戏的音乐主要由爵士风的电子音乐组成。
可洛莉卡沿着一条固定路线跳跃，随机出现的敌人和障碍物会出现在她面前。通过各种按键组合可以避开特定的障碍物，不过也有“一键式”的简单模式可供选择。当你避开一个障碍物时，会发出一个音符，连续避开一长串障碍物会让正在播放的歌曲中突然出现有趣的旋律。这种游戏玩法让人想起该工作室早期的游戏《音乐彩带》。
有些障碍物是可以互动的，比如可以跳到火箭上并乘坐一小段距离，其他的则可以直接踢开或跳过。
偶尔会有一顶皇冠出现在障碍物上方，如果你成功越过它，你将短暂地飞跃关卡，避开任何可能出现在你路径上的东西。在那些可能需要奇特按键组合的障碍物出现之前，这种情况尤其常见。

NAME: Riviera - Yakusoku no Chi Riviera
NAME_ZH: 里维埃拉 - 誓约之地
DESC:
Riviera: The Promised Land is a turn based role playing game. It follows a traditional RPG formula - once peaceful land now ravaged by demons and their wars with angels. However, it also incorporates a "dating sim" as a subplot where your character must win affection of another character.
It has similarities to Fire Emblem, Final Fantasy Tactics, Golden Sun and a number of others. Reaching high levels is important to make the game not too difficult at the end. The levelling up is similar to Secret of Mana, where the weapon skill for a character increases at a different rate to the character levels.
DESC_ZH:
《里维埃拉：誓约之地》是一款回合制角色扮演游戏。它遵循传统的角色扮演游戏模式——曾经和平的土地如今被恶魔肆虐，陷入与天使的战争。不过，它还融入了“恋爱模拟”元素作为支线情节，玩家的角色必须赢得另一个角色的好感。
它与《火焰之纹章》《最终幻想战略版》《黄金太阳》等游戏有相似之处。达到较高等级对于让游戏在后期不会太难很重要。升级机制类似于《魔法秘宝》，角色的武器技能提升速度与角色等级提升速度不同。

NAME: Rockman EXE - N1 Battle
DESC: Taking place within the timeline of the Battle Network series, Rockman EXE N1 Battle involves a battling tournament called the "Battle Chip GP" among various pairs of online avatars called "NetNavis" and their human operators. Rather than directly control the player character through the traditional real-time tactical role-playing battles of the other Battle Network games, Rockman EXE N1 Battle tasks the player with creating a "Program Deck" made up of abilities called "Battle Chips". The game randomly selects chips for the player and executes them in a duel with a computer-controlled opponent.
DESC_ZH: 故事发生在《网络对战》系列的时间线内，《洛克人EXE N1对战》包含一场名为“战斗芯片大奖赛”的对战锦标赛，参赛的是被称为“网络领航员”的各类线上虚拟形象及其人类操控者。与《网络对战》系列其他游戏中通过传统实时战术角色扮演战斗直接操控玩家角色不同，《洛克人EXE N1对战》要求玩家创建一个由名为“战斗芯片”的技能组成的“程序卡组”。游戏会为玩家随机挑选芯片，并在与电脑控制的对手的对决中执行这些芯片。

NAME: Rockman EXE WS
DESC: Rockman EXE WS is a spin-off loosely based on Mega Man Battle Network's anime adaption. The game attempts to blend traditional platforming with Battle Network's chip collection.
DESC_ZH: 《洛克人EXE WS》是一款衍生作品，大致基于《洛克人网络争霸战》的动画改编。该游戏尝试将传统的平台跳跃玩法与《网络争霸战》的芯片收集机制相融合。

NAME: Romancing Sa-Ga
DESC: Once upon a time, three evil gods fought against the holy gods, and the holy God-Father chose a human warrior to help them. Finally, after a prolonged, terrible war, the leader of the three evil gods - Death, the eldest of them - surrendered. The youngest evil god, Schirach, became a human and has lost her powers. The middle one, Saruin, was sealed away in the dark world. Now, after thousand years have passed, and the seal of Saruin has weakened, it is time for you, the hero of the new generation, to defeat him.
DESC_ZH: 从前，三位邪神与神圣诸神展开了战斗，神圣之父选择了一名人类战士来帮助他们。最终，经过一场漫长而可怕的战争，三位邪神的首领——最年长的死神——投降了。最年轻的邪神希拉赫化身为人类，失去了她的神力。中间的那位，萨鲁因，被封印在了黑暗世界。如今，千年已过，萨鲁因的封印已经减弱，现在轮到你，新一代的英雄，去击败他了。

NAME: RUN=DIM - Return to Earth
DESC:
In the early 21st century, due to the global warming that has accelerated since the end of the previous century, several tens of percent of the earth's land was submerged. Many big cities were submerged in the sea, and the global economy was devastated. 
 
The year is 2052. The world has established a new order centered on the two major camps, the Space Development Organization ?Jesus? and the International Civil Organization ?Green Frontier?. The two major organizations that were born as a result of repeated mergers by large corporations around the world will eventually become more tense over space development initiatives. And, with the surprise attack on the side of Jesus, the two camps finally enter the battle! 
 
The player chooses and plays either pilot Kazuhito Moriguchi (boarding machine RUN = DIM) or Kanna Aso (boarding machine I = RA) belonging to the Green Frontier camp. The game consists of 6 stages.
DESC_ZH:
21世纪初，由于从上世纪末开始加速的全球变暖，地球百分之几十的陆地被淹没。许多大城市被海水吞没，全球经济遭受重创。

时间来到2052年。世界以两大阵营——太空开发组织“耶稣”和国际民间组织“绿色前沿”为中心建立了新秩序。这两个由全球各大企业反复合并而诞生的主要组织，最终因太空开发计划而关系愈发紧张。随后，随着“耶稣”一方的突然袭击，两大阵营最终陷入了战斗！

玩家可以选择扮演隶属于“绿色前沿”阵营的飞行员森口和仁（搭乘机体RUN = DIM）或麻生佳奈（搭乘机体I = RA）进行游戏。游戏共有6个关卡。

FILE: Saint Seiya - Ougon Densetsu Hen - Perfect Edition (Japan).zip
NAME: Saint Seiya - Ougon Densetsu Hen - Perfect Edition
NAME_ZH: 圣斗士星矢 - 黄金传说篇 - 完美版
DESC: Saint Seiya Golden Legend and Golden Legend Complete Edition released on NES from 1987 and 1988 are revived in Wonderswan! This Perfect Edition combines the two NES versions into one with new graphics. In addition, the strongest enemy of Golden Legends that did not appear in the NES version has been added to the game.
DESC_ZH: 1987年和1988年在任天堂红白机上发布的《圣斗士星矢 黄金传说》和《黄金传说 完全版》在万代神奇天鹅掌机上重获新生！这个完美版将两个任天堂红白机版本合二为一，并采用了全新的画面。此外，游戏中还加入了黄金传说中在任天堂红白机版本里未曾出现过的最强敌人。

NAME_ZH: SD高达 - 宇宙世纪作战
DESC: When you start playing the game and reach the main menu, you will have some things which you can cho
DESC_ZH: 当你开始玩游戏并进入主菜单时，你会看到一些可供选择的内容。

FILE: SD Gundam Eiyuu Den - Kishi Densetsu (Japan).zip
NAME: SD Gundam Eiyuuden - Kishi Densetsu
NAME_ZH: SD高达英雄传 - 骑士传说
DESC: SD Gundam Eiyden: Kishi Densetsu is a video game developed and published by Bandai in march 2001 for the WonderSwan Color. It's a video game adaptation of the series based on the Mobile Suit Gundam anime and most particularly Super Deformed Gundam. It's part of a two-parts video game series.
DESC_ZH: 《SD高达英雄传：骑士传说》是万代于2001年3月为彩色惊奇天鹅掌机开发并发行的一款电子游戏。它是一部基于《机动战士高达》动画系列，尤其是《超级变形高达》改编的电子游戏。它是一个分为两部的电子游戏系列的一部分。

DESC: SD Gundam Eiyden: Musha Densetsu is a video game developed and published by Bandai in march 2001 for the WonderSwan Color. It's a video game adaptation of the series based on the Mobile Suit Gundam anime and most particularly Super Deformed Gundam. It's part of a two-parts video game series.
DESC_ZH: 《SD高达英雄传：武者传说》是万代于2001年3月为彩色惊奇天鹅掌机开发并发行的一款电子游戏。它是一部基于《机动战士高达》动画系列，尤其是《SD高达》改编的电子游戏。它是一个分为两部的电子游戏系列的一部分。

FILE: SD Gundam G Generation - Gather Beat 2 (Japan).zip
NAME: SD Gundam G-Generation - Gather Beat 2
NAME_ZH: SD高达G世纪 - 收集节拍2
DESC: Gather Beat 2 is a strategy game with an original storyline. It includes content from Mobile Suit Gundam and sub stories such as 0080, 0083 and 08.
DESC_ZH: 《收集节拍2》是一款拥有原创剧情的策略游戏。它包含了《机动战士高达》的内容以及如《0080》《0083》和《08》等外传故事。

FILE: SD Gundam G Generation - Mono-Eye Gundams (Japan) (Rev 2).zip
NAME: SD Gundam G-Generation - Mono-Eye Gundams
NAME_ZH: SD高达G世纪 - 独眼高达
DESC: The final Wonderswan entry in the G Generation franchise. As opposed to the console games, Monoeye Gundams features an original crossover plot.
DESC_ZH: G世纪系列在万代掌机Wonderswan上的最后一作。与主机游戏不同，《独眼高达》拥有原创的交叉剧情。

FILE: Senkaiden Ni - TV Animation Senkaiden Houshin Engi Yori (Japan).zip
NAME: Senkaiden Ni - TV Animation Senkaiden Houshin Engi
NAME_ZH: 仙海伝2 - 电视动画《仙海伝封神演义》
DESC: A beautiful female fox spirit named Dakki is controlling the emperor Chu-o and the ruling In dynasty, and is using her power over him to do evil in the nation. An immortal-in-training named Taikobo is chosen by the great immortal sages for the Houshin Project - to seal away or destroy the evil demons that infest the world. In the course of his adventures, Taikobo gathers other powerful companions and sets out to seal away the demons and eventually destroy the fox-spirit Dakki.
DESC_ZH: 一只名为妲己的美丽狐妖控制了纣王和统治天下的殷朝，她利用对纣王的掌控在国内为非作歹。一位名为太公望的修仙者被伟大的仙人选中参与封神计划——封印或消灭肆虐世间的邪恶妖魔。在冒险过程中，太公望结识了其他强大的伙伴，一同踏上封印妖魔的征程，并最终消灭狐妖妲己。

FILE: Shaman King - Asu e no Ishi (Japan) (Rev 1).zip
NAME: Shaman King - Asu heno Ishi
DESC: This is an RPG with a branching storyline. Depending on your progress, you will be able to experience history that can't be found in the original work. Defeat Shamans in battles with your spiritual powers and Shaman energy.
DESC_ZH: 这是一款拥有分支剧情的角色扮演游戏。根据你的游戏进度，你将能够体验到原著中未曾出现的剧情。运用你的灵力和通灵能量，在战斗中击败通灵师。

NAME: Soroban Gu
DESC:
This is an action puzzle game, in which blocks appearing one after another are aligned and erased. However, the top, bottom, left, and right of the screen loop in this game. As a result, the blocks will be connected unexpectedly.
The battle mode, which is a classic action puzzle, is also supported. In this mode there are three levels of difficulty, so you can play with friends of different skill levels.
DESC_ZH:
这是一款动作解谜游戏，在游戏中，依次出现的方块会被排列并消除。不过，在这款游戏里，屏幕的上下左右是循环相连的。因此，方块会意外地连接起来。
它还支持经典动作解谜的对战模式。在这个模式中有三个难度级别，所以你可以和不同水平的朋友一起玩。

FILE: Star Hearts - Hoshi to Daichi no Shisha (Japan).zip
NAME: Star Hearts - Hoshi to Daichi no Shisha
NAME_ZH: 星之心脏 - 星与大地的使者
DESC:
Star Hearts is a WonderSwan Color exclusive fantasy action role-playing game set in the fictional world of Uras, which has a large floating fortress in the center. The protagonist is selectable by the player at the beginning of the game, either the boy or the girl depicted on the front cover, together with some input such as the name, date of birth, and a blood type. The story starts with the player character about to become the new village chief. The ceremony gets interrupted by a bunch of attacking monsters and the hero barely escapes with their life.
The game uses a 3/4 view where the player moves in a vertical and horizontal way, can interact with other NPCs and fight enemies on the screen using projectiles or blunt weapons. Fighting is done in real-time, and after battling many weaker enemies, one will usually face a boss. While the player starts the game alone, they will get a pet companion, choosable out of four different types, in the middle of the journey. Leveling up is not done through gaining experience from combat, but instead by finding fairies scattered around the land.
DESC_ZH:
《星之心脏》是一款仅适用于万代彩色天鹅掌机（WonderSwan Color）的奇幻动作角色扮演游戏，游戏设定在虚构的乌拉斯世界，世界中心有一座巨大的浮空要塞。玩家在游戏开始时可以选择主角，即封面所绘的男孩或女孩，同时还能输入诸如姓名、出生日期和血型等信息。故事始于玩家角色即将成为新的村长。然而，就职仪式被一群来袭的怪物打断，主角勉强逃生。
游戏采用 3/4 视角，玩家可以在屏幕上进行垂直和水平移动，与其他非玩家角色（NPC）互动，并使用投射物或钝器与敌人战斗。战斗为实时进行，在击败众多较弱的敌人后，通常会遭遇一个首领级敌人。玩家在游戏开始时独自行动，但在旅程中途会获得一个宠物伙伴，可从四种不同类型中选择。角色升级并非通过战斗获得经验，而是通过寻找散布在各地的精灵来实现。

NAME: Super Robot Taisen Compact 3
NAME_ZH: 超级机器人大战紧凑版3
DESC:
Super Robot Taisen Compact 3 is a tactical role-playing game from the Super Robot Wars series. The main feature of the franchise is having a story that crosses over several popular mecha anime, manga and video games, allowing characters and mecha from different titles to team up or battle one another.  
 
The player usually gets to move their forces first, one at a time, then control switches to the game's AI.
DESC_ZH:
《超级机器人大战紧凑版3》是《超级机器人大战》系列的一款战术角色扮演游戏。该系列的主要特色是拥有一个融合了多部热门机甲动漫、漫画和电子游戏的故事，让不同作品中的角色和机甲能够组队或相互战斗。

玩家通常可以先依次移动自己的部队，然后控制权交给游戏的人工智能。

NAME: Terrors 2
DESC:
Terrors 2 is a interactive text-based story with accompanying images that feature the following Japanese pop stars: Risa Goto, Kaori Manabe, Erika Yamakawa, Nami Ichinohe, Yumi Uehara. The games story is one of horror slowly sneaking into a Japanese school. The plot is revealed through four scenarios. The choices you make in the story will affect the path it takes, as such there are numerous alternate ending to encourage multiple playthroughs. 
Terrors 2 could connect to the internet with the WonderGate so that ingame events would take place at the same time of day that the player was experiencing.
DESC_ZH:
《恐怖2》是一款基于文本的互动故事游戏，配有相关图片，其中有以下几位日本流行歌星：后藤理沙、真锅香织、山川绘里香、一之江奈美、上原由美。游戏故事讲述的是恐怖氛围逐渐潜入一所日本学校的情节。剧情通过四个场景逐步展开。你在故事中做出的选择会影响剧情走向，因此有众多不同的结局，鼓励玩家多次游玩。
《恐怖2》可以通过WonderGate联网，这样游戏内的事件就会与玩家所处的现实时间同步发生。

NAME: Tetris
DESC: Tetris for Wonderswan Color is the first Tetris Guideline (current specification that The Tetris Company enforces for all Tetris game since 2001) compatible game in Japan.
DESC_ZH: 《万代彩色天鹅掌机版俄罗斯方块》是日本首款符合《俄罗斯方块准则》（自2001年起，俄罗斯方块公司对所有《俄罗斯方块》游戏实施的现行规范）的游戏。

NAME: Uchuu Senkan Yamato
DESC:
Uchuu Senkan Yamato is a Strategy game, developed by Tom Create and published by Bandai Visual in Japan in 2001. 
Each of the game's 17 levels plays like an episode with text interchanges and battles (fought both in space and on various planets) that alternate between tactical moves and short cutscenes to show the results. There are also 8 new scenarios plugged in to freshen up the story with new enemies such as a hotshot Gamilas commander to rival General Lysis, a space creature or two, and the Siren of Space?a game version of the little-known manga spinoff, Eternal Story of Jura. Depending on performance and points earned, multiple endings are possible including one that incorporates the ?hologram Starsha' scene from the Yamato movie.
DESC_ZH:
《宇宙战舰大和号》是一款策略游戏，由Tom Create开发，万代视觉于2001年在日本发行。
游戏的17个关卡每一关都像是一集剧情，包含文字对话和战斗（战斗既发生在太空，也发生在各个星球上），战术行动和简短过场动画交替出现以展示战斗结果。此外，游戏还加入了8个新剧情，引入了新敌人来丰富故事内容，比如有能与利ysis将军相抗衡的王牌加米拉斯指挥官、一两只太空生物，还有“太空妖姬”——这是鲜为人知的漫画衍生作品《朱拉的永恒故事》的游戏版。根据玩家的表现和获得的分数，游戏可能会有多种结局，其中一种结局还融入了《大和号》电影里“全息星砂”的场景。

NAME: Wild Card
DESC: Although made by  Square, the famous Japanese RPG developer, "Wild Card" is a game that is very different from classic Asian RPGs. Most importantly, it is not story-driven. The game is based entirely on quests which are not connected by a story arc. You play a nameless character with no background and there is no plot information or development beside your own progress with the quests. The gameplay consists entirely of playing cards. In the beginning of the game, an enigmatic woman named Maria asks you a series of questions, to determine the cards you get. After that, your character begins an adventure in a town. Locations, other characters, inventory, your movement - everything appears in form of cards. To get quests, you must choose your correspondent cards when encountering different people. You can buy weapons and equipment, and also fight enemies in turn-based combat by choosing the cards from your deck. You gain levels and become stronger in a traditional RPG fashion.
DESC_ZH: 尽管《王牌》由日本著名的角色扮演游戏开发商史克威尔制作，但它与经典的亚洲角色扮演游戏截然不同。最重要的是，它并非以剧情为驱动。这款游戏完全基于任务，且这些任务之间没有连贯的剧情线。你扮演的是一个没有名字、没有背景的角色，除了完成任务的进度之外，没有任何剧情信息或发展。游戏玩法完全围绕纸牌展开。在游戏开始时，一位名叫玛丽亚的神秘女子会问你一系列问题，以此来决定你获得的纸牌。之后，你的角色将在一个小镇开启冒险之旅。地点、其他角色、物品栏、你的行动——一切都以纸牌的形式呈现。要接受任务，你必须在遇到不同的人时选择相应的纸牌。你可以购买武器和装备，还能通过从牌组中选择纸牌，以回合制战斗的方式与敌人作战。你可以像传统角色扮演游戏那样提升等级、变得更强。

NAME: With You: Mitsumete Itai
DESC: With You is an adventure game with static graphics, in which the game advances as you choose what to do from a list of possible actions. Long time ago, a man and a woman made a promise, stating that although they were destined to be lonely souls, they should always remain together. But by a cruel joke of fate, they were separated and sealed into two jewels that were hidden for generations. Manami, who left the country 6 years before, has found one of the jewels while traveling. He will return to Japan to meet with their friends from childhood. This will entail a meeting of the two jewels again, for the second jewel seems to be owned by his father.
DESC_ZH: 《与你相伴》是一款静态画面冒险游戏，玩家需从一系列可能的行动中做出选择，以此推动游戏进程。很久以前，一男一女许下承诺，尽管他们注定是孤独的灵魂，但也要永远相伴。然而，命运弄人，他们被分开并封印在两颗宝石中，这两颗宝石被隐藏了好几代。6年前出国的真奈美在旅行时找到了其中一颗宝石。他将回到日本，与儿时的朋友们相聚。这将使两颗宝石再次相遇，因为第二颗宝石似乎为他的父亲所拥有。

FILE: Wizardry Scenario 1 - Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord (Japan).zip
NAME: Wizardry Scenario 1 - Proving Grounds of the Mad O
NAME_ZH: 巫术场景1 - 疯狂霸主的试炼场
DESC:
Wizardry Scenario 1 - Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord is a RPG developed and published by Sir-Tech Software in march 2003 for the WonderSwan Color. 
The player generates and control a party of up to six different adventurers, choosing from five races (humans, elves, dwarves, gnomes and hobbits), three alignments (good, neutral and evil), and four basic classes (fighter, priest, mage and thief). These can later evolve into elite classes if they meet the necessary level requirements. After outfitting the party with basic weapons and armor, the player sends it into a 3D vector maze-like dungeon to fight monsters in turn-based combat and find treasure.
DESC_ZH:
《巫术场景1 - 疯狂霸主的试炼场》是一款由Sir - Tech Software开发并发行的角色扮演游戏，于2003年3月在万代彩色天鹅掌机（WonderSwan Color）上推出。
玩家可以创建并控制最多由六名不同冒险者组成的队伍，可从五种种族（人类、精灵、矮人、侏儒和半身人）、三种阵营（善良、中立和邪恶）和四种基础职业（战士、牧师、法师和盗贼）中进行选择。如果满足必要的等级要求，这些职业后期可以进阶为精英职业。在为队伍配备好基础武器和护甲后，玩家将其送入一个类似三维矢量迷宫的地下城，进行回合制战斗以对抗怪物并寻找宝藏。

NAME: Namco Wonder Classic
DESC:
Wonder Classic is a golfing game developed by Yoshidayama-Workshop and published by Bandai in january 2011 for the WonderSwan Color. 
You will use different characters with specific abilities to your advantage. For example the character, Reiko Nagase nullifies the effects of wind, most others have certain benefits to certain types of shot. There are two starting characters and twenty-two unlockable and downloadable characters.
DESC_ZH:
《经典奇迹》是一款由吉田山工作室开发、万代于2011年1月为彩色惊奇天鹅掌机发行的高尔夫游戏。
你可以利用不同角色的特殊能力为自己创造优势。例如，角色长瀬玲子可以消除风的影响，其他大多数角色在特定类型的击球上也有一定优势。游戏中有两个初始角色，还有二十二个可解锁和下载的角色。

NAME: X - Card of Fate
DESC: This is Tokyo - the keystone that keeps Earth from falling into ruin.
DESC_ZH: 这里是东京——维系地球免于毁灭的关键所在。
